revised_title: Post-tetanic Tremor: A Supplementary Note on Identical Phenomena in Lobsters and Crayfish
tldr: The author, David Fraser Harris, discusses the phenomenon of post-tetanic tremor in muscles and its relation to previous research on similar tremors in lobsters and crayfish. He acknowledges the work of Dr. Sydney Binger and Professor C. Bichet, who also observed identical tremors in their respective studies.
